It's the same.\""},{"lineNumber":241220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":241221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいや、これだけの力があるのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, with power like this,"},{"lineNumber":241222,"originalJapaneseLine":"　危険なことには変わりない」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's still dangerous.\""},{"lineNumber":241223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここにいるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The ones here are,"},{"lineNumber":241224,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界の中心人物ばかり」","translatedEnglishLine":"all the key figures of the world.\""},{"lineNumber":241225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様らに見せるのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought it was very meaningful to show you all this and brought you here, but...\""},{"lineNumber":241226,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大いに意味があると思い連れてきたが……」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":241227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本来であれば今回のこれですら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Originally, even this action just now,"},{"lineNumber":241228,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あまりに危険な行為だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is an extremely dangerous act.\""},{"lineNumber":241229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「以後、スチールホラーとのゲートは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From now on, the gate to Steel Horror"},{"lineNumber":241230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必要がなければ開かないものとする」","translatedEnglishLine":"shall not be opened unless necessary.\""},{"lineNumber":241231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then...\""},{"lineNumber":241232,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルが指を鳴らす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle snapped his fingers."},{"lineNumber":241233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「帰るとするか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go home.\""},{"lineNumber":241234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのぉ……ミラクルさん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... Miracle-san...\""},{"lineNumber":241235,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私と健太郎くんは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentaro-kun and I...\""},{"lineNumber":241236,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちに残ったら駄目……かな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"is it no good if we stay here...?\""},{"lineNumber":241237,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What?\""},{"lineNumber":241238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕達は元々こっちの世界の人間なんです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We originally come from this world.\""},{"lineNumber":241239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So...\""},{"lineNumber":241240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「余は別に構わんがな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't particularly mind...\""},{"lineNumber":241241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カオスマスター、どうだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos Master, what do you say?\""},{"lineNumber":241242,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":241243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Umm...\""},{"lineNumber":241244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かった、いいだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":241245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、達者でな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, take care.\""},{"lineNumber":241246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、余達はこれで帰る。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, we will return now."},{"lineNumber":241247,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前達はここに残るがよかろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"You may stay here.\""},{"lineNumber":241248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様らの話、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your story was,"},{"lineNumber":241249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中々、興味深かったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"quite interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":241250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美樹ちゃん、こっちでも元気でね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki-chan, stay well over here too...\""},{"lineNumber":241251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさん、ミラクルさん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance-san, Miracle-san..."},{"lineNumber":241252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィルおねぇちゃん……うるうる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiiru-oneechan... *teary eyes*\""},{"lineNumber":241253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これまでお世話になりましたー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you for everything so far!\""},{"lineNumber":241254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ましたー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you!\""},{"lineNumber":241255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばいばーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bye-bye!\""},{"lineNumber":241256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、俺達は帰るぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, we're heading back!\""},{"lineNumber":241257,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹と健太郎をその場に残し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Leaving Miki and Kentaro behind,"},{"lineNumber":241258,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はゲートを通り元の世界へ戻っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others went through the gate and returned to their original world."},{"lineNumber":241259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目だ、連れて帰る」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I'll bring you back.\""},{"lineNumber":241260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんな危険な世界に残していけるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't leave you in such a dangerous world.\""},{"lineNumber":241261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、そんなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, no way...\""},{"lineNumber":241262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仕方ないよ、美樹ちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It can't be helped, Miki-chan."},{"lineNumber":241263,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王化もなんとかしないといけないし」","translatedEnglishLine":"We also need to do something about the Demon Lord transformation.\""},{"lineNumber":241264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, right."},{"lineNumber":241265,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王のままでは帰れないね」","translatedEnglishLine":"You can't go back while still being the Demon Lord.\""},{"lineNumber":241266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっぱり、魔王、魔人を治してからかぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So after all, we have to cure the Demon Lord and the Demon first...\""},{"lineNumber":241267,"originalJapaneseLine":"（危ない、危ない……","translatedEnglishLine":"(That was close, that was close..."},{"lineNumber":241268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ美樹ちゃんの処女をいただいてないのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"I haven't taken Miki-chan's virginity yet,"},{"lineNumber":241269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別れるわけにはいかないからな）","translatedEnglishLine":"so I can't separate from her yet.)"},{"lineNumber":241270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにお世話になってる、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, I want to help Lance and the others who've been so good to me.\""},{"lineNumber":241271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスさん達に協力もしたいしね」","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えー、本当は危ないとこじゃないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, it's actually not a dangerous place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスさん達はすぐに喧嘩するから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance and the others get into fights quickly,
that's why it ends up like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「向こうの世界だって、悪いことしたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even in the other world, if you do something bad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警備隊に捕まるでしょ？　一緒だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the guards catch you, right? It's the same."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや、これだけの力があるのだ。
危険なことには変わりない」
世界の中心人物ばかり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the key figures of the world."
"I thought it was very meaningful to show you all this and brought you here, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大いに意味があると思い連れてきたが……」
「本来であれば今回のこれですら、
あまりに危険な行為だ」
「以後、スチールホラーとのゲートは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, the gate to Steel Horror

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要がなければ開かないものとする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shall not be opened unless necessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが指を鳴らす。
こっちに残ったら駄目……かな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is it no good if we stay here...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕達は元々こっちの世界の人間なんです」
カオスマスター、どうだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos Master, what do you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達はここに残るがよかろう」
「美樹ちゃん、こっちでも元気でね……」
シィルおねぇちゃん……うるうる……」
「これまでお世話になりましたー」
美樹と健太郎をその場に残し、
ランス達はゲートを通り元の世界へ戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others went through the gate and returned to their original world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな危険な世界に残していけるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't leave you in such a dangerous world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王化もなんとかしないといけないし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We also need to do something about the Demon Lord transformation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王のままでは帰れないね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't go back while still being the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっぱり、魔王、魔人を治してからかぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So after all, we have to cure the Demon Lord and the Demon first..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ美樹ちゃんの処女をいただいてないのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven't taken Miki-chan's virginity yet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別れるわけにはいかないからな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I can't separate from her yet.)
"Besides, I want to help Lance and the others who've been so good to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさん達に協力もしたいしね」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
